publishedfiledetails.title: Unnerf Lone Wolf
publishedfiledetails.short_description:
This mod reverts the definitive edition nerfs aimed at lone wolf. 

It reverts the caps for attributes from 40 to 70
It also reverts the cap for combat skills from 10 to 20 

The tooltip for Lone wolf will still say 10 and 40 respectively but the mod

publishedfiledetails.title: Enemy Upgrade Overhaul
publishedfiledetails.short_description:
Enemy Upgrade Overhaul is my own personal twist on a randomized system for buffing enemies, allowing for more challenging encounters with weighted, randomized upgrades, and a chance of bonus treasure depending on how tough the enemy becomes.

publishedfiledetails.title: [DE] Instant merchant refresh
publishedfiledetails.short_description: Well, if you tired to wait while vendor refresh his stuffs this mod for you. Now for DE! Yes technically this is same as old mod for original edition by SirButtsington.

publishedfiledetails.title: Cap Tweaks
publishedfiledetails.short_description:
[h1]Cap Tweaks[/h1]
Simple mod that adjusts a few values, primarily skill caps as well as a small boost to default carry weight.

[h2]Changes[/h2]
Attribute cap is moved from 40 to 80.
Skill cap is moved from 10 to 20.
Civil cap is moved from 5 to 7.

publishedfiledetails.title: Summoning Tweaks - Permanent Summons
publishedfiledetails.short_description:
Makes every player summon, from mods or not, permanent.

This mod can be used this standalone, or alongside [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1502424642]Summoning Tweaks[/url] for a more customized summoning experience.
